RawLine: TNPC_70010333,中間的石版應該就是解題順序，而作為開頭的{color=#FF0000}提筆書起{/color}便是提示持筆假人身旁的句子。,中间的石版应该就是解题顺序，而作为开头的{color=#FF0000}提笔书起{/color}便是提示持笔假人身旁的句子。

Items.mt: The middle lithograph should be the sequence of the solution, and the beginning of the book with the pen is the sentence that suggests the dummy holding the pen.
